name: Police Havoc
description:
The city is overrun with criminals and you are the only policeman who can stop this crime spree.

Sometimes you will have the opportunity to use helicopter turrets tanks among other types of vehicles to fight crime in the city.

In this minimalist-inspired game or third-person action game, you'll get into the suit of a policeman in his only objective is to destroy the bad guys in one way or another and fulfilling his missions in the city.

The game has several languages including English, our main language, Spanish, Portuguese and traditional Chinese.
